exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K f : K -> V x : K Unable to unify "exists M : R, 0 < M /\\ (forall x0 : ?U, norm (?M2363 x0) <= M * norm x0)" with "exists l : V, is_derive f x l".

original: apply Build_is_linear. - intros x y. reflexivity. - intros k x. reflexivity. - exists 1. split. -- apply Rlt_0_1. -- intros x. simpl. rewrite Rmult_1_l. apply Rle_refl.
